title: Welcome to Aquaponics
body: Aquaponics combines aquaculture (raising fish) and hydroponics (growing plants without soil) in a symbiotic environment.

title: Sustainable Ecosystem
body: Fish waste provides organic nutrients for plants, and plants naturally filter the water for the fish. It's a perfect cycle!

title: Grow Fresh Food
body: With aquaponics, you can grow organic vegetables and raise healthy fish all year round, even in small spaces.

title: Water Efficient
body: Aquaponics uses 90% less water than traditional agriculture by recycling water through the system.

title: Get Started
body: Start your aquaponics journey today! Monitor your system and track growth with our easy-to-use app.
